name: Lijiayao Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Datong Co., Ltd.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E5%A4%A7%E5%90%8C%E6%9D%8E%E5%AE%B6%E7%AA%92%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E8%B4%A3%E4%BB%BB%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. Lijiayao Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Lijiayao, Xiaojingzhuang Township, Zuoyun County, Datong City

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Datong Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by a joint venture with 70% ownership by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group and 30% by Shanghai Jiyou Energy.
